translation.Meta description: Web3 cross-chain bridge that facilitates seamless token transfer between the aelf blockchain and Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) compatible networks.
translation.Connect aelf wallet to view transaction: Connect aelf wallet to view transaction history
translation.Grant permission to access your funds?: Grant permission to access your funds?
translation.cross-chain transfer between aelf and ot: cross-chain transfer between aelf and other public chains (e.g. MainChain AELF to Ethereum).
translation.When the network is not congested: When the network is not congested:
translation.The minimum crosschain transaction fee i: The minimum crosschain transaction fee is around
translation.Estimated time of heterogenous cross-cha: Estimated time of heterogenous cross-chain arrival is {{time}}
translation.Estimated time of homogeneous cross-chai: The estimated time of internal cross-chain transaction is {{time}}
The estimated time of internal cross-chain transaction is {{time}} minutes.
translation.Your transfer will take about a few minu: Your transfer will take about {{time}} minutes to complete.
translation.Cross Chain time: Estimated time of heterogenous cross-chain arrival is {{heterogeneous}}
translation.You pay fees for the fromChain transacti: You'll only pay fees for the {{fromChain}} part of the transaction. We're covering the fees on aelf for you.
translation.Tokens will arrive automatically after b: Please allow some time for tokens to be shown automatically in your wallet.
translation.Once finished, You can verify this on th: Once finished, the tokens will appear automatically in the recipient's wallet. You can verify this on the blockchain explorer.
translation.Estimated time of sending tokens is time: Estimated time of arrival is {{time}} minutes.
translation.Once the token is sent cross-chain: Once the token is sent cross-chain, the recipient needs to visit eBridge, connect the "To" wallet, and select the "Receipt ID" to receive the token. This will incur transaction fees on {{toChain}} so the recipient should ensure there's a sufficient balance to pay for the fees.
translation.Initiate cross-chain transfer to the rec: Enter recipient address and send (no need to connect the "To" wallet)
translation.Click the button to receive the token(s): Click the button to receive the token(s) transferred
translation.Transaction is being processed, please d: Transaction is being processed, please don't close this window.
translation.To add a new token, you need to initiate: To add a new token, you need to initiate 2 transactions here to create the token on {{chain}}
translation.This token does not exist on: This token does not exist on {{chain}}
translation.Click the button below to proceed: Click the button below to proceed.
translation.Request submitted. Please synchronize th: Request submitted. Please synchronize the token info.
translation.The amount to be transferred should be s: Transaction request failed. The amount to be transferred should be smaller than {{amount}} {{symbol}}.
translation.Notification Content Section 1: This is an ALPHA version of eBridge. As such, delays may occur, and catastrophic bugs may lurk. Thanks, for trying it at this early stage.
translation.Notification Content Section 2: For any issues, join our Telegram group for support:

Upgrade Notice.section 2: We are currently upgrading our system to serve you better. During this period, the eBridge service is temporarily unavailable. We kindly advise you to refrain from using the service at this moment to avoid any potential inconveniences or losses.
Upgrade Notice.section 3: We appreciate your understanding and patience and look forward to providing you with an improved eBridge experience soon.
Upgrade Notice.section 5: For any issues, join our Telegram group for support:

translation.have reached the daily limit: {{tokenSymbol}} transfers from {{fromChain}} to {{toChain}} have reached the daily limit, which will reset at 00:00 (UTC) each day. Please try again after the reset.
translation.have a daily limit and your current tran: {{tokenSymbol}} transfers from {{fromChain}} to {{toChain}} have a daily limit and your current transaction exceeds the remaining quota of {{amount}} {{tokenSymbol}}. The limit will reset at 00:00 (UTC) each day. Please try again after the reset or consider transferring a smaller amount.
translation.have a maximum capacity and your current: {{tokenSymbol}} transfers from {{fromChain}} to {{toChain}} have a maximum capacity and your current transaction exceeds the available capacity of {{amount}} {{tokenSymbol}}. The capacity will be refilled in {{time}} minutes. Please try again after that.
translation.Your current transaction exceeds the cap: {{tokenSymbol}} transfers from {{fromChain}} to {{toChain}} have a maximum capacity of {{amount}} {{tokenSymbol}}. Your current transaction exceeds the capacity and can't be processed. Please consider transferring a smaller amount.
translation.eBridge daily limit specification desc: To enhance security and protect our users' assets, eBridge imposes daily transfer limits for each token in each direction.

eBridge rate limits desc.section 1: To keep eBridge secure, we use rate limits for token transfers. Here's how they work:
eBridge rate limits desc.section 2: We apply these limits on both the sending and receiving blockchains for extra security.
eBridge rate limits desc.section 3: Let's use USDT transfers from Ethereum to aelf as an example:
eBridge rate limits desc.section 5: Refill rate: 500 USDT per second (up to 50,000 USD every 2 minutes)
eBridge rate limits desc.Section 6: If someone transfers 50,000 USDT, the bucket is completely empty. To transfer another 5,000 USDT, you'd need to wait 10 seconds for the bucket to refill enough.

eBridge rate limits desc section 1 list.section 1: 1. Each token has a 'bucket' with a maximum capacity.
eBridge rate limits desc section 1 list.section 2: 2. This bucket slowly refills over time.
eBridge rate limits desc section 1 list.section 3: 3. Every transfer uses some of the bucket's capacity.
eBridge rate limits desc section 1 list.section 4: 4. If the bucket is empty, you need to wait for it to refill before making another transfer.

translation.input address error: Please enter a correct address that matches the "To" chain.
translation.Synchronising data on the chain 2: Please wait 5-10 minutes before initiating a new transaction.
translation.Request rejected. eBridge needs your per: Request rejected. eBridge needs your permission to continue.
translation.Learn more about transfer and limits: Learn more about eBridge's transfer and rate limits
translation.By connecting a wallet, you agree to our: By connecting a wallet, you agree to our
translation.Let's connect your aelf wallet to get st: Let's connect your aelf wallet to get started.
translation.Nice! Now let's connect your aelf wallet: Nice! Now let's connect your aelf wallet.
translation.Choose this option if you wish to send t: Choose this option if you wish to send to an address without connecting wallet.
translation.The Transaction fee also needs to be app: The Transaction fee also needs to be approved. Don't refresh or close the page until the operation is complete.
translation.The transaction has been approved. You c: The transaction has been approved. You can check it's status in the “Transactions” page.
translation.The transaction was not signed. It was r: The transaction was not signed. It was rejected.
translation.Check the transaction status from the tr: Check the transaction status from the transaction records.
translation.For more details, click on the From/To T: For more details, click on the From/To TXID to track its progress on the Explorer.
translation.The total value of all assets locked in: The total value of all assets locked in liquidity pools across eBridge.
translation.The total value of the liquidity you hav: The total value of the liquidity you have added to all pools on eBridge.
translation.The number of liquidity pools currently: The number of liquidity pools currently active on eBridge.
translation.The number of different tokens available: The number of different tokens available across all liquidity pools on eBridge.
translation.You currently don’t have any positions i: You currently don’t have any positions in pools.
